Reviews.Title: “An average hotel, below the typical La Quinta standard”
Reviews.Author: Travel_and_Learn99
Reviews.Content: 1 night decent price thanks name own price thru bidding website staff friendly ok typical la quinta standard stayed half dozen lqs bit rundown breakfast crowded people time stay maybe price

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the money”
Reviews.Author: TravelingGrammy2011
Reviews.Content: tried usual hotel chains due illinois wrestling found looked la quinta inn available reviews mixed bad pleasantly surprised clean pretty comfy breakfast ok albeit little crowded understandable boys town elevator floor bad knee happy managed ok

Reviews.Title: “Clean Good Location!”
Reviews.Author: xtagus
Reviews.Content: folks drove wisconsin football game booked hotel couple months ago clean roomy complaints walls thin learned drunk badger fans couldnt key 2am travel ear plugs wasnt bad didnt towels reminded gym towels club thin time paid 140 night folks senior discount 127 pets cuz heard dog park following morning pet owners cuz didnt smell look critters samsung 36 inch flat screen tvs nice stay

Reviews.Title: “friendly service. good location”
Reviews.Author: thomasannen
Reviews.Content: check happy easy clean tv updated nice watch hd smell migh cleaner window filled fresh air fine plenty eat withing walking distance breakfast continental plus style clean quiet value price wasy highway

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, very clean, could use some updating”
Reviews.Author: CFire2000
Reviews.Content: stayed university illinois graduation weekend expected rate assume lower throughout clean updating service free breakfast nice free internet faster hotels

Reviews.Title: “Quite Disgusted”
Reviews.Author: gossipghoulv
Reviews.Content: smoking promised nonsmoking phone ok reeked pool disgusting hadnt cleaned swarming 2 letters 6 months compensation horrible stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: LoganSquareNeighbor
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times times rates expensive highly recommend hotel families children warm outdoor pool clean pool nice plenty towels provided free breakfast varied generous

Reviews.Title: “Does not meet La Quinta Standards”
Reviews.Author: txcouple70
Reviews.Content: booked 4 night stay online la quinta visiting family champaign ogden il champaign greeted nicely expressed checkin entered hall surprise smell tell stay door straight bed pulled covers nicely bed pushed mattress hand sunk 3 12 impression bed impression bed mattress looked ton egg rested mattresses replaced continuous called front desk told attendant cancel 4 day reservation bed hotel meet la quinta standards service lesson learned dont book 4 star hotel online getting thank goodness courtyard marriott street accomodated 4 nights stay reservation notice hats courtyard marriott georgetown texas longtime 16 la quinta

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all cost!”
Reviews.Author: Madwolf
Reviews.Content: stayed june 10th hotel repairs upgrade smelled dirty sox bathroom fans noisy couldnt hear carpets dont socks id walk barefoot illinois corn field internet service access hotel lobby dog night counted 5 floor dogs explains carpet
